page.title: 05 Our School in West Stafford
page.content: This is Highfield Grove Middle School, age range 9-13. There are 17 teachers and 17 classrooms.Some children from the school have been interviewed about the school.We have chosen the most interesting and popular answers. 1.What do you like about our school? (A).THe variation of lessons,the games, the equipment and the teachers. 2.What don't you like about our school? (A).Lunch hour too short and after school detention. 3.What is your favourite school dinner? (A).Chips,beans,hotdogs and chocolate cracknut. 4.What sort of sports do you enjoy? (A).Rounders,football and athletics. 5.Do you go to any Clubs? (A).Gymnastics,tennis,badminton and athletics. 6.What is lively about our school? (A).Mr Smith(music teacher) the pupils.
